firstNightReminder: Place the Night 1 reminder next to the Summoner.
otherNightReminder: · If the Summoner has a Night 1 reminder, replace it with a Night 2 reminder. · If the Summoner has a Night 2 reminder, replace it with a Night 3 reminder. The Summoner points to a player and a Demon icon. That player is now the evil Demon.
name: Summoner
ability: You get 3 bluffs. On the 3rd night, choose a player: they become an evil Demon of your choice. [No Demon]

firstNightReminder: After Dawn, tell all players that this player is the Vizier.
name: Vizier
ability: All players know who you are. You can not die during the day. If good voted, you may choose to execute immediately.

firstNightReminder: The Kazali points to a player and a Minion on the character sheet. Replace their old character token with the Minion token, show them the “You Are” info token then the Minion character token, and give a thumbs down. Repeat until the normal number of Minions exist.
otherNightReminder: The Kazali points to a player. That player dies.
name: Kazali
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. [You choose which players are which Minions. -? to +? Outsiders]
